REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1426 reute u f BC-HADSON-<HADS>-TO-ACQU 03-25 0033

TEXT.TITLE: HADSON <HADS> TO ACQUIRE 85 PCT OF SEAXE <SEAX>
TEXT.BODY: Hadson Corp said it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire 85 pct of the outstanding common stock of Seaxe Energy Corp. The company said it will buy the 85 pct interest in Seaxe from shareholders owning restricted or controlled shares for less than 200,000 Hadson common shares. It said closing is subject to the approval of title assignments by the French government. Seaxe is involved in oil and natural gas exploration and development in the Paris Basin of France. Reuter
